source:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Mogek is in need of a master crafter's touch.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
バール・レス広場のお利口のモグエクは、冒険者にお願いがあるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_01The Mogmenders are planning to restore the walls surrounding Bahrr Lehs. Unfortunately, they lack the supplies to do so, leaving the moogles no choice but to scavenge for serviceable material. Mogek asks that you meet with these scavengers at the Landlord Colony and see if they have found anything worth using.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_01※本クエストには「 レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

モグエクから、廃材を探しているモーグリ族と協力して、壁を修復するための補修材を調達してほしいと頼まれた。ランドロード遺構の「廃材探しのモーグリ族」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_02<tab>You come across one of the moogles tasked by Mogek and he seems overwhelmed by the volume of rubble to be sifted and sorted. In the hopes of speeding things along, he asks you to help him search for potential crafting material.
target: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_02<tab>廃材探しのモーグリ族と話し、周辺の遺跡で使えそうなものを探すことになった。ランドロード遺構で「<var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA0B901 /var>」から「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C4201 /var>」を3つ入手しよう。

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_03<tab>Your efforts in searching through rubble have rewarded you with three prime pieces of salvageable material. Take back what you have found for appraisal.
target: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_03<tab><var 28 ((EObj)) F61EA0B901 /var>から<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C4201 /var>を3つ入手した。ランドロード遺構の「廃材探しのモーグリ族」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C4201 /var>」を渡そう。

source:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_04The rummaging moogle is pleased with your find. Combined with materials found prior to your arrival, he supplies you with the ingredients to synthesize supplies for repairing the wall. Once completed, return to Bahrr Lehs with the items.

※In the event you lose the materials or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with the rummaging moogle.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_04廃材探しのモーグリ族にを渡したところ、彼の廃材と合わせたを受け取った。「」をもとに「」を製作し、バール・レス広場の「お利口のモグエク」に納品しよう。

※「」を失った場合は、廃材探しのモーグリ族に話しかけましょう。材料を入手し、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_05<tab>Mogek is pleasantly surprised by the set of newly crafted supplies you offer to him. With these in hand, he plans to waste no time in setting the Mogmenders to work.
target: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_SEQ_05<tab>モグエクに<var 28 ((Item)) F23D7101 /var>を納品した。これで壁の修復も、いっそう進むことだろう。
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_TODO_00<tab>廃材探しのモーグリ族と話す

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_TODO_01<tab>Search the rubble heaps in the Landlord Colony for salvageable material.
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_TODO_02<tab>Show the salvageable material to the rummaging moogle.
target: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_TODO_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8C4201 /var>を廃材探しのモーグリ族に渡す

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize wall repair supplies.)) ((Deliver the wall repair supplies to Mogek the Marvelous.)) /var>
target: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 蛮族クエスト：<var 28 ((Item)) F23D7101 /var>を製作)) ((お利口のモグエクに<var 28 ((Item)) F23D7101 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_MOGEK_000_000<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Just the <var 08 E905 ((craftswoman)) ((craftsman)) /var> I was looking for, kupo! We're gathering materials for the restoration of the walls surrounding the plaza grounds, and your help would be most appreciated.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_MOGEK_000_000お願いがあるのですくぽ。
うちの若いモーグリと協力して、遺跡の壁の修復に使用する、
補修材を調達してほしいのですくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_MOGEK_000_001<tab>I dispatched a few able-bodied moogles to the Landlord Colony in search of salvageable goods, and I want to be sure what they find can be put to good use. I'd like you to check on their progress and bring back anything they've found so far.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_MOGEK_000_001「廃材探しのモーグリ族」は出発済みなので、合流してくださいくぽ。
きっと「ランドロード遺構」にいるはずなので、
よろしくお願いしますくぽ。

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_010<tab>I don't even know where to begin, kupo! Would you help me find some choice materials for the Mogmenders?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_010この辺りには本当に遺跡が多いくぽ。
使えそうなものがたくさん落ちててモグだけじゃ大変そうだから、
冒険者さんにも、一緒に探してほしいくぽ♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_011<tab>We should be able to cover more ground if we split up. You head west, and I'll stay here and see what I can find. Between the two of us, something is bound to impress Mogek.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_011から何か使えそうなものを見つけたら、
モグに渡してくぽ～！

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_012<tab>I know there's lots of rubble to sift through, but try not to take too long, kupo.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_012から何か使えそうなものを見つけたら、
モグに渡してくぽ～！

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_020<tab>Welcome back! So, what did you find?
target: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_020<tab>何か使えそうなものは、落ちてたくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_021<tab>I was only expecting scraps, kupo! Where did you find this?
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_021どうもありがとうくぽ♪
これなら、モグが見つけてきた廃材と併せれば……。

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_022<tab>We can make scrapers to get rid of moss on the walls with this. Ahem. I mean <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> can make scrapers, kupo.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_022壁の石材から、コケをこそげ落とすための、
金属のヘラが作れそうくぽ。
冒険者さんの見事な腕前で作ってほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_023<tab>We can make tools to polish the walls with this. Ahem. I mean <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> can make tools, kupo.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_023壁の石材を磨くための道具が作れそうくぽ。
冒険者さんの見事な腕前で作ってほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_024<tab>We can make reagents for restoring the walls with this. Ahem. I mean <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> can make reagents, kupo.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_024壁の石材を磨くための研磨材が作れそうくぽ。
冒険者さんの見事な腕前で作ってほしいくぽ！

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_025<tab>Far be it from me to deny a <var 08 E905 ((craftswoman)) ((craftsman)) /var> the chance to show off <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> skills. Now then, when you've finished, take the supplies back to Mogek. I'm going to stay here and see if there's anything else worth taking.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_025材料が足りなくなったら、モグの持っている分をあげるくぽ。
モグは、ここでもう少し使えそうなものを探してみるから、
仕上がったら、モグエクに渡してくぽ～♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_026<tab>Still crafting, are we? You need but say the word if you're running short on materials. When you've finished, Mogek will be more than happy to take what you have, kupo.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_026材料が足りなくなったら、モグの持っている分をあげるくぽ。
モグは、ここでもう少し使えそうなものを探してみるから、
仕上がったら、モグエクに渡してくぽ～♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_027<tab>You certainly have a knack for this, kupo! Mogek will be most pleased. Hurry back and show him your wonderful work.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_YOUNGMOOGLE02294_000_027お願いしたものは、もう仕上がってるみたいくぽよ？
モグエクに渡してあげてくぽ～♪

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_MOGEK_000_030<tab>There you are! Did they find anything suitable for our work on the walls?
target: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_MOGEK_000_030<tab>壁の修復に使えそうなものは、無事に調達できましたくぽ？

source: TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_MOGEK_000_031<tab>Oh my! This is more than suitable. With this, the walls will gleam as they haven't in a thousand years, kupo! I'll have the Mogmenders get to work right away.
target:
TEXT_BANMOG201_02294_MOGEK_000_031これさえあれば、壁の修復も捗るはず……
さっそく、ビシバシ職人たちを働かせるのですくぽ！
